title: Handle.Exception.Input
description: Profile-aware input for the Handle.Exception capability.

profile.description: Optional reference to the subject/org profile to load.

profilePatch.description: Optional modifications to apply to the loaded profile.

agent_ref.description: Reference to the agent that encountered the exception.

exception_type.description: Type or category of the exception.

stack_trace.description: Stack trace associated with the exception, if available.

context.description: Additional contextual information relevant to the exception.
